categories: Category:Wizards of the Coast Expanded Universe articles

nodes.text: "Hazard and Rocket Troopers" was a web enhancement written by Cory J. Herndon and released by Wizards of the Coast on December 11, 2003 as a companion to Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy. It provided a description and Star Wars Roleplaying Game stats for Hazard troopers and Rocket troopers.
